lines.text: Use the ammeter to determine the unknown resistance

secText: The circuit contains two light bulbs and a 12-volt battery. One of the light bulbs, R1, has a resistance of 75 Ω. Your task is to determine the resistance of the R2 bulb.

Use the ammeter, Ohm’s law, and your knowledge of equivalent resistance in series circuits to determine the resistance of the R2 bulb. In order to solve the problem, you may want to first consider what the equivalent resistance of the two resistors must be, given the reading of the ammeter and the voltage shown for the battery.
